item.title: JA-SIG Summer Conference Proposals Due Wednesday, March 7
item.description:
JA-SIG With Altitude! June 24-27, 2007 Denver CO, USA
The deadline for submitting a proposal for a presentation, a birds-of-feather session, or a kiosk at the JA-SIG Summer conference in Denver is Wednesday, 07 March 2007. The committee welcomes proposals from all attendees. We...

item.title: Improving the Sakai User Experience
item.description:
Members of the Sakai community,
If the Sakai user experience is important to your organization please read on. The Sakai leadership team has decided to establish a new Foundation staff position to lead community effort toward an ever-improving user experience. The...

item.title: Sakai 2.3.1 Released
item.description:
The Sakai Foundation announces the release of the Sakai Collaboration and Learning Environment, version 2.3.1.
Sakai 2.3.1 is a security update that addresses two critical security vulnerabilities in the Sakai 2.3.0 maintenance release. Anyone running unpatched versions of 2.3.0 should upgrade to 2.3.1...

item.title: Sakai 2.2.3 Released
item.description:
The Sakai Foundation announces the release of the Sakai Collaboration and Learning Environment, version 2.2.3.
Sakai 2.2.3 is a security update that addresses two critical security vulnerabilities in the Sakai 2.2.x maintenance releases. Anyone running unpatched versions of 2.2.x should...

item.title: Press Release: Sakai Foundation's Response to Blackboard's Patent Pledge
item.description: The Boards of Directors of the Sakai Foundation and of EDUCAUSE recognize the patent pledge announced on February 1, 2007 by Blackboard as a step in a more positive direction for the community, to the extent that it offers some...
